activities:
We provide a web-hosted software solution to our clients that allows them to host virtual events. In order for their customers to access the content, personal information may be collected to create user credentials. 
This personal information is stored on secure servers and is not sold, rented or in any way distributed to outside parties with out the user's consent. Our clients have access to their customer information and provide their own privacy policies for use of this information.
